title: По щучьему велению
overview: Katia, an athlete and a beauty, dreams of getting into the national team. But in training Katya falls and injures her knee. The doctor says Katya will walk, but she will have to part with sports if she does not perform the operation. But Katia and her mother have no money for the operation. Instead of Katya, her girlfriend Sveta will participate in the competition. To her also goes Katya's boyfriend - Igor. Katya can not see them together, so she leaves for the village where her grandmother lives. She hopes to recover there for sports and heal a mental wound.  But in the village of Katya is not waiting for a quiet pastoral life, but a lot of surprises. Hiding in the wilderness from everyone, Katya unexpectedly meets love, finds out the family secret that mother hid from her, and finds her father.
